2017.title: Red Hat Academic Training Program
2017.description: Prof. Satvik Khara provided a golden opportunity of REDHAT training coordinated by Prof. Karishma Gandhi and Prof. Darshil Shah with 22 faculties and 6 Lab Assistants participating.

2018.title: AI Workshop
2018.description: A hands-on workshop on Artificial Intelligence was organized with industry experts.

2018.title: Hackathon
2018.description: IIIT Sonepat students participated in a 36-hour national hackathon on innovation.

2019.title: Tech Fest 2019
2019.description: Annual tech fest with robotics, coding competitions, and guest lectures.

2019.title: Blockchain Seminar
2019.description: Industry professionals delivered talks on blockchain applications.

2019.title: Cultural Fest
2019.description: Cultural events including music, dance, and theater performances.

2020.title: Virtual Classes
2020.description: Due to COVID-19, classes were conducted online with virtual labs and seminars.

2021.title: Startup Pitching Event
2021.description: Students pitched startup ideas to investors in a demo day event.
